channel.title: [PI]Soul KIngdom[PI]
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to the development team for Soul Kingdom let me start off by telling you about my goals. [center][size=36pt]Goals[/size][/center]
My first goal is to make a nice server with many things to do from pking - skilling
My second goal is to make alot of friends along the way
My 3rd goal is to create a custom project insanity based server
My 4th goal is to make a server that is unique in its own way
[center]Now let me tell you who is on the team[/center] [center][size=36pt]The Team[/size][/center] [center]Owner/Coder : Syndr0me Owner/Hoster : Lucky Server Coder : Syndr0me, Client coder : Forums Coder : Lucky, Gfx Designer : Server Admin(s) : Server Mod(s) : Forum Admin(s) : Forum Mod(s) :[/center] [center]Wanting to apply for the team ? then please use this format[/center] [center][size=36pt]Format[/size][/center] [center]
Applying for : Years of expierience : Msn : How many hours are you on a day : Why should you be chosen :
[/center] [center]Now Let me show off a some pictures[/center] [center][size=36pt]Pictures[/size][/center] [center]Mining [URL=http://img826.imageshack.us/i/miningx.png/][IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/4180/miningx.png[/img][/URL][/center] [center]skilling area [URL=http://img508.imageshack.us/i/skillingarea.png/][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/4479/skillingarea.png[/img][/URL][/center] [center]Thiefing [URL=http://img830.imageshack.us/i/thieving.png/][IMG]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/6053/thieving.png[/img][/URL][/center] [center]Woodcutting [URL=http://img408.imageshack.us/i/wcings.png/][IMG]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/9659/wcings.png[/img][/URL][/center] [center]Alright thats all and remember to Apply Apply and Apply ![/center]

item.title: [PI]Soul KIngdom[PI]
item.dc:creator: @jamal123 jamal123
item.description:
@jamal123 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:9, topic:365494”]You will have much respect from me if you change all the teleport’s areas (Besides pestcontrol, and the Minigames of course. Plus the slayer areas unless you want to change them) then indeed this would be a unique server as far as the Teleports and areas.

Good luck on the project though.[/quote]

yup iam planning on changing the slayer areas

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Soul KIngdom[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You will have much respect from me if you change all the teleport’s areas (Besides pestcontrol, and the Minigames of course. Plus the slayer areas unless you want to change them) then indeed this would be a unique server as far as the Teleports and areas.

Good luck on the project though.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Soul KIngdom[PI]
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

This is a horrid source/Development, I would have never copied OblivionPK’s skilling area. It’s so shit.

On-topic; Good luck, with your Development Team.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Soul KIngdom[PI]
item.dc:creator: @jamal123 jamal123
item.description:
@jamal123 wrote:

[quote=“Pluvia, post:6, topic:365494”][quote author=jamal123 link=topic=461695.msg3377616#msg3377616 date=1287770656]
i mean obpk v1 had the same place as a skilling area therefore i based my skilling area from it because i liked it alot
[/quote]
Great way to start off with some something “unique” don’t you think?[/quote]
very

item.title: [PI]Soul KIngdom[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

jamal123:

lol yea because my skilling area is based off of obpk v1

That is a fair point, may I inquire what you mean by “based”. Do you mean a look-a-like or generally based off the source/code that Obpk used. I do not mean to pollute your thread with any unnecessary posts.

On to the topic more I wish you luck.

Read full topic
